text: Adrian Pigulea (born 12 May 1968) is a retired Romanian football striker.Weltfussball ==Honours== ;Universitatea Craiova *Liga I: 1990–91 *Cupa României: 1990–91 ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:FC Progresul București players Category:Association football forwards Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Romania international footballers
title: Adrian Pigulea
